text: Jakob Oetama (27 September 1931 â€“ 9 September 2020) was an Indonesian journalist. He was the co-founder and owner of Kompas Gramedia Group. He also created Kompas Daily in 1965, one of the leading newspapers of Indonesia. Oetama was born in Central Java. Oetama died on 9 September 2020 in Jakarta at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indonesian writers Category:Journalists Category:Indonesian businesspeople
title: Jakob Oetama
